EmailTemplate.description: PGi Webinar Prospecting on Steroids with Video
EmailTemplate.name: PGi Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Join me for a webinar on video collaboration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
I want to invite you to a webinar that PGi is hosting next week. It’s about how sales teams are effectively "turning the camera on" with video to engage prospects faster and differentiate from competitors. In this webinar, you’ll learn how to:
* Quickly turn online conversations into face-to-face virtual meetings * Make a killer first impression with conversation starters * Deliver high impact with your tone and body language * Do a complete tech check * Set up your office or cube to wow your prospects
Topic: Can You See Me Now? Prospecting on Steroids with Video
Date: Tuesday, May 8th Time: 11 AM (PT) and 2 PM (ET)
Speakers: Todd McCormick—VP of SMB Sales, PGi Josiane Feigon—President, Telesmart, & Author Smart Selling on the Phone and Online
Register Here:http://pages.pgi-email.com/pgi_videosales_webinar/
You may also be interested in viewing our recorded webinar, “Video: The Sales Tool You Can’t Live Without.” You can view it here: http:bcove.me/rz612pr6 No registration is required.
I hope you can join us! If not, just let me know if you’d like a link to the replay after the event and I’ll forward it to you. Please also share with colleagues who may be interested.
